s: Summary: Skyline Soirée is an invite‑only high‑signal gathering hosted by Kronos Research, CoinEx and ViaBTC to discuss token market making and structured products.
Topics: Token market making, OTC execution, structured products, liquidity provisioning, real‑time flow management.
Speakers: Kronos analysts, CoinEx executives, ViaBTC leaders.
r: Gain tactical knowledge on high‑frequency token market making.
Connect with OTC desks and structured‑product innovators.
Position your firm to capture liquidity premium in volatile markets.
